title: #52: Crazy Train (Christina Pazsitzky)
itunes:title: Crazy Train with Christina Pazsitzky
description: Christina Pazsitzky had me over at her house for wine and Skittles the other night and we talked about a shit ton of stuff and then some. We centered on the topic of depression but we meandered so much that this went for almost 3 hours. But it was so interesting the whole time, that's why I kept letting it go. Well, that and the wine.
